methods.name: getSectionOperationPermissoin
methods.description: 查询用户在指定板块中的所有操作权限.

outs.name: subjectPublishAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_SUBJECT_PUBLISH:用户是否可以在版块中发布主题.

outs.name: subjectAuditAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_SUBJECT_AUDIT:用户是否可以审核在版块中发布的主题.

outs.name: subjectManageAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_SUBJECT_MANAGEMENT:用户是否可以在版块中对已发布主题进行删除等管理操作.

outs.name: subjectRecommendAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_SUBJECT_RECOMMEND:用户是否可以在版块中对主题进行推荐操作.

outs.name: subjectStickAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_SUBJECT_STICK:用户是否可以在版块中对主题进行置顶操作.

outs.name: subjectCreamAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_SUBJECT_CREAM:用户是否可以在版块中对指定主题进行精华主题设置操作.

outs.name: replyPublishAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_REPLY_PUBLISH:用户是否可以审核在版块中的所有回复内容.

outs.name: replyAuditAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_REPLY_AUDIT:用户是否可以在版块中对回复进行审核.

outs.name: replyManageAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_REPLY_MANAGEMENT:用户是否可以在版块中对回复进行查询或者删除.

outs.name: sectionManageAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_SECTION_MANAGER:用户是否可以在版块中对子版块进行创建和删除等操作.

outs.name: sectionPermissoinManageAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_PERMISSION_MANAGEMENT:用户是否可以对论坛用户进行版块的权限管理.

outs.name: sectionConfigManageAble
outs.description: 对应权限SECTION_CONFIG_MANAGEMENT:用户是否可以对版块进行系统参数配置修改.

methods.name: getSubjectOperationPermissoin
methods.description: 查询用户对指定主题的所有操作权限.

outs.name: replyPublishAble
outs.description: 用户是否可以在该主题中进行回复操作.
